document_name: Law No. 93/2001 establishing procedures in order to prevent climatic changes and their effects
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PRT/2000/PRT-2000-08-20-Law No. 93_2001 establishing procedures in order to prevent climatic changes and their effects_8222a0aaeebe6c928e51875b2e8a0dff.pdf
document_description: This law establishes the National Observatory on Climate Change to collect information on and research climate change, and report to the legislature. It requires the government to create a comprehensive plan to reduce emissions, adapt to climate change, and raise awareness.
